patterns_discovered.description: Using [[...pathname]] syntax to allow Clerk to handle all authentication flow variations dynamically
patterns_discovered.context: Both sign-in and sign-up use catch-all routes for flexible authentication handling
patterns_discovered.benefit: Allows Clerk to manage complex auth flows without hardcoding specific routes

patterns_discovered.description: Sign-in and sign-up pages follow identical structure with only component name variation
patterns_discovered.context: Both pages use same layout, styling approach, and appearance customization
patterns_discovered.benefit: Consistency and maintainability across authentication pages

patterns_discovered.description: Using Tailwind CSS for responsive, mobile-first layout design
patterns_discovered.benefit: Responsive design without custom CSS, consistent spacing and alignment

patterns_discovered.description: Leveraging Clerk's built-in appearance customization instead of custom styling
patterns_discovered.context: Using appearance prop with elements.rootBox and elements.card configurations
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains Clerk's design system while allowing light customization

gotchas_discovered.description: Double square brackets [[...pathname]] are necessary for Clerk to properly intercept and handle authentication flows
gotchas_discovered.impact: Without this syntax, Clerk components may not function correctly for all auth flow variations
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure directory structure uses [[...sign-in]] and [[...sign-up]] exactly as specified

gotchas_discovered.description: Clerk's appearance API only allows targeting specific element classes, not full custom styling
gotchas_discovered.impact: Deep design customization may require Clerk theme variables or custom CSS workarounds
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Document available appearance options in Clerk docs for future customization needs

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Background Color Applied to Wrapper Div
gotchas_discovered.description: bg-slate-50 applied to full-screen wrapper, not the Clerk component itself
gotchas_discovered.impact: Page background is light slate, but Clerk card may have its own background defined
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Test on actual browser to ensure color scheme is visually cohesive
